Package org.jcvi.jillion.sam

This package contains classes for working with Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) and Binary Alignment/Map (BAM) formatted data.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SamAttributed
    A class that implements this interface has queryable SamAttributes.
    SamFileDataStore
    DataStore wrapper around a single SAM or BAM file.
    SamParser
    SamParser is an interface that can parse SAM or BAM files and call the appropriate methods on the given SamVisitor.
    SamRecord
    SamRecord is an interface for the object representation of a single alignment in a SAM or BAM encoded file.
    SamVisitor
    SamVisitor is the visitor interface to visit a single SAM or BAM file.
    SamVisitor.SamVisitorCallback
    SamVisitorCallback is a callback mechanism for the SamVisitor instance to communicate with the parser that is parsing the SAM or BAM file.
    SamVisitor.SamVisitorCallback.SamVisitorMemento
    SamVisitorMemento is a marker interface that SamParser instances can use to "rewind" back to the position in its SAM or BAM file in order to revisit portions of the that file.
    SamWriter
    SamWriter is an interface for writing SAM or BAM encoded files.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSamVisitor
    AbstractSamVisitor is an implementation of SamVisitor that implements all the methods of SamVisitor as empty methods.
    SamFileDataStoreBuilder
    Builder class that will create new instances of SamFileDataStoreBuilder using the provided configuration information.
    SamFileWriterBuilder
    SamFileWriterBuilder is a Builder object that will create a SamWriter implementation to write out either SAM or BAM formatted files and optionally re-sort them.
    SamParser.SamParserOptions  
    SamParserFactory
    SamParserFactory is a Factory class for creating SamParser instances depending of if the provided file is a SAM or BAM encoded file.
    SamRecordBuilder
    Builder object to build new instances of SamRecords.
    SamRecordFlags
    Immutable Wrapper around bit flags set in a SAM/BAM file to show which SamRecordFlag values are present in this SamRecord.
    VirtualFileOffset
    VirtualFileOffset is an object representation of a BAM virtual file offset as defined in the SAM specification.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SamRecordFlag
    SamRecordFlags is an object representation of the SAM bit flags column for each record.
    SortOrder
    Sorting Order of alignments in a SAM/BAM file.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SamValidationException  

Package org.jcvi.jillion.sam Description

This package contains classes for working with Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) and Binary Alignment/Map (BAM) formatted data. .
Author:
dkatzel
